name: NrG PIGEONZ x CROCS HOMING PIGEON

metadata.name: CROCS HOMING PIGEON #2/246
metadata.description:
A very special NFT for a very special partnership! To celebrate our most recent collaboration with STAPLE & Crocs, we are launching two hundred and forty-six (246) Homing Pigeon NFTs on September 10th exclusively on STAPLEVERSE.  All original purchasers of the NFT will be able to redeem a physical pair of the highly sought after STAPLE x Crocs Homing Pigeon clogs for free! This limited-edition design takes Crocs’ iconic All-Terrain Clog to a new level, embodying a New York state of mind with one-of-a-kind Jibbitz™ charms inspired by the trinkets that the city's most skilled treasure hunter, the great Homing Pigeon, discovers; including a condom wrapper, soda can top, NYC sewer cover, earring, lighter, safety pin, and STAPLE's signature pigeon. Available in Men's size 4-13, no half sizes.
All original purchasers of the Homing Pigeon NFT must claim their physical shoe on STAPLEVERSE from September 11th through September 21st.
